projects.title: Windows 10 Change Manager
projects.description:
[PT] Change Manager responsável pela implementação do Windows 10, sharepoint, SCCM e OneDrive. O projeto se iniciou em desenhar a estratégia para o Brasil, selecionando Key Users (+130 usuários), treinando e comunicando. O deployment para a empresa foi para mais de 4.000 usuários. Os principais desafios foram na definição dos lotes de migração, logística de USB para mais de 50 sites levando em consideração limitantes de Network, resultados no UAT, perfil do usuário, comunicação e dependência de outros processos e sistemas.

[EN] Change Manager responsable for Windows 10 implementation, sharepoint, SCCM and OneDrive deploy. From end-to-end, the process started from designing strategy for Brazil, selecting key users around Brazil (+130 users), training and communicate. The deploy for the whole company was for more than 4.000 users. The main challenge was define migration batches, USB logistics for the more than 50 sites taking in consideration network constraints, UAT results, user profile, communications, dependencies among other process.

projects.title: Global OneSAP for Import and Export Process - Hypercare Phase

[EN] Responsible for:

> Manage main deliveries of the project in the final phase
> Report to the Management Board
> HyperCare Process Design
> Tickets control and escalation
> Enhancements Delivery

projects.title: Microsoft Technology Change Manager & Implementation Lead
projects.description:
[PT] Change Manager responsável pelo Brasil durante a implementação do Outlook, Skype e nova solução mobile em 2015. O escopo e seus objetivos foram alinhados aos guidelines de gerenciamento da mudança da Microsoft:

> Articulação clara as mudanças de comportamento e expectativas;
> Encorajar a adaptação top-down;
> Construir uma comunidade de Key users entre os usuários;
> Mensurar o uso e adoção contra os objetivos traçados.

Brasil representa o país mais complexo do grupo. Em TI havia mais de 4.500 usuários e 56 sites, considerando sites e usuários remotos.

A rede de Key users foi construída através de 200 usuários ajudando na comunicação, change management, solução de incidents, testes e feedbacks.

Foi a primeira vez que o Brasil fe o deployment de uma ferramenta como pioneiro no grupo. O suesso foi provado através dos pontos abaixo:

- 99% de sucesso na migração;
- 80% de usuários migrados nos 3 primeiros dias;
- Incident por usuário abaixo das expectativas.

[EN] Change manager responsible for Brazil cluster during Outlook, Skype, and new mobile solution in 2015. The scope of the project and its goal were aligned to the Microsoft change management guidelines:

> Clearly articulates the behavior changes and expectations
> Encourages adoption from the top-down
> Builds a community among users
> Measures usage and adoption against stated goals

Brazil represents the most complex country of the group. Considering IT, there were 4.500 users and 56 sites, considering remotes sites and users.

The network was built with more than 200 users in all over Brazil helping with communication, change management, incidents solutions, tests and feedbakcs.

That was the first time Brazil has deployed a global IT project at first among to the other countries. It success was proved by:

- 99% of Migration event success
- 80% of users migrated in the first 3 days of the migration
- lower incident per user KPI in comparison to what was expected

projects.title: Loja Lacta online
projects.description:
Loja online para venda de produtos Lacta, combos, presenteáveis e Personalização.

Participação do conceito, detalhamento do escopo, execução, controle, mídia online e gestão da plataforma.

Execução operacional (estoque, entrega, definição de parceiros) e online (mídia digital), além de implementação do site para personalização do Lacta Specials.

projects.title: Industrial Loss Consumption Reduction
projects.description:
[PT] Líder de projeto para redução de perdas nas linhas de produção, atingindo resultados em controle de inventário, subcontratação e redução de perdas em molhos.
Os resultados foram vistos em algumas categorias de molhos e embalagens. O projeto também foi nomeado a semi-final do L'Oréal Beauty Shaker Awards, premiação da L'Óreal em excelência.


[EN] Project leader for losses in production line, achiving results in asset control, subcontractor and bulk internal losses reduction. The results were seen in package loss reduction and in some bulk categories. The project was also nominated up to semifinal in L´Oréal Beauty Shaker Awards, L´Óreal excellence award, in Improvement category.

projects.title: BSC Implementation - L´Oreal Factory (Rio de Janeiro)
projects.description:
[PT] Líder de projeto na implementação do BSC na fábrica da L´Oréal. Projeto patrocinado pela Diretora Financeira da fábrica. Cascade dos objetivos desde a estratégia da Operação Global para a fábrica, servindo de suporte na seleção de projetos para os Gerentes seniors.

O projeto foi apresentado ao senior leadership e os objetivos e KPIs utilizados como guia da estratégia para os anos seguintes.

[EN] Project leader for BSC implementation in L´Oréal factory sponsored by Financial Management Director. Cascade of objectives and goals from Global Operations to the factory and supporting the senior managers in improvement project selection.

The project was present to the senior leadership and golas and KPIs used to guide the operational strategy for the following yeas.

projects.title: OneSAP Communication – IT & Access Control List (ACL)
projects.description:
[PT] Líder de comunicação para para IT das novas governanceas TO-BE pós implementação do novo template, entendimento e divulgação dos processos de Hypercare e pós hypercare de abertura de ticket, divulgação da nova metodologia de Controle de Acesso, follow-up das etapas de implementação de comunicação.

Projeto de ACL também assistido na fase de implementação na fábrica da L’Oréal.

[EN] Communication lider for the TO-BE IT Governance process, understand and advertise the new Hypercare  and post-hypercare processes, open ticket process, advertise the new Access Control List tool and governance, project communication follow-up milestones.

ACL project also assisted in the implementation phase in L’Oréal factory.

Responsible for global reports and benchmarking with other countries to share best practices.

Double digital growth in 2019 and leading the same in 2020.
profile_positions.title: E-commerce Manager

profile_positions.description:
E-commerce Projects B2C and B2B.

Launch of Loja Lacta in Easter season with 40% of increase in the sellout YoY, Midia Plan validation, operations build (from stock, to delivery and invoicing), project delivery and front-end development. Also responsile for the second release of the store with Lacta Special Personalization being responsible in all stages.

In the project B2B I am leader and responsible for the project governance, team, project delivery, Business case and activation plan. Project Pilot was delivery with success
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - Ecommerce

profile_positions.description:
IT Operations Consultant responsible for the main processes, enhacements and Key Users relationships. Enhacements analysis for operations system as Flexnet, SAP and Thomson. UAT planning and follow-up, stoppover alignmenet, tickcets follow-up. Also financial planner for IT in Brazil site. Responsible for budget control (Actual X Planned), quarterly planning, financial reports and KPIs, Recharges for other countries, monthly closing coordination and P&L Analysis. IT Overhead split ratio for functional areas, accounting provision control, cash flow follow-up. Also responsible for P&L monthly presentation to the IT Board. 
IT Business consultant for Operations. Accountable for key process, enhancements and relationship with senior key users.
profile_positions.title: IT Business Partner & Planning

profile_positions.description:
Project Portfolio Management, CAPEX and OPEX control, responsible for project opening analysis and payback approval, Resource Allocation, Status report and 3 year plan analysis. Financial planner for IT in Americas Region (South America, Caribbean, Canada) and Brazil.  Activities related to overheads management,  budget control (Actual X Planned), follow-up of  Monthly closing activities and deviation analysis, quarterly and annual budget, TCO (Total Cost of Ownership) consolidation,  Global and Regional recharges control. Main tools used: SAP, HFM and Clarity.

Achievements: Planning IT team reformulation and reduction of 50% of the team with activities arrangements, Portfolio Management process simplification and 100% of budget accomplished with no deviation in all years.
Projects : implementation Lead for Windows 10, Change Manager for  Outlook & Skype, Deploy SAP Import & Export, IT Operations Business Analyst.
profile_positions.title: IT PMO & Planning

profile_positions.description:
L ́Oréal factory with the most complex operation of the group regarding product catalogue and subcontractor production. Main activities related to Production Costs Control, Industrial Price calculation, Industrial Budget planning, Real X Budget control and its deviation analysis, quarterly and annual direct costs budget. Masterdata Analysis in SAP, Man-hour ratio calculation, absenteeism calculation, assets control, monthly closure, consumption losses analysis, KPIs and its impacts analysis, sell-in analysis and inventory control

Achievements: Overtime reduction, masterdata process improvement for industrial price calculation, Consumption loss reduction in some material categories, New inventory policy implemented, BSC (Balanced Scorecard) implementation and its presentation to the Board, New Purchase area implemented.
profile_positions.title: Financial Analyst

profile_positions.description: Mainly responsible for all RFQs in all factories in Latin America and Headquarters.
